constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 151 (Tuesday, September 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of New Jersey:
H.R. 8926.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Constitutional authority on which this bill is based is
Congress's power under the Commerce Clause in Article I,
Section 8, of the Constitution.
[Page H8011]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Protect Pregnancy Care Centers Act of 2022
